I have a job opportunity for you if you are interested, please share me your resume at lovely@tanishasystems.com or call me (732) 377-3746 Ext 735.Role: Java Developer/ LeadLocation: Dallas TX (Onsite) Experience- 10+Interview in weekend and find Round F2F Job DescriptionOur client is seeking a Java/J2EE developer with MongoDB experience and Kafka.Responsibilities include:Design and planning of architecture to support goals of the projectDevelop large scale complex applications that are deployed to a distributed architectureAssist development teams in activities such as load testing, troubleshooting, and performance tuningDesign highly scalable databases and develop applications against a relational database requiredUtilizes expert knowledge of J2EE and Java development to troubleshoot technical issues (error messages, software bugs, performance )Proactively communicates with the development, QA teams and management to anticipate configuration management issues/process and project issuesProactively seeks opportunities to implement improvements to internal team processesEnsures that all best practices and enterprise standards are followed.
